title: Balqees (singer)
summary: Balqees Ahmed Fathi (Arabic: بلقيس أحمد فتحي; born October 20, 1984), widely known by the mononym Balqees (بلقيس), is an Emirati singer and actress hailing from Yemen. She came from an artistic family as her father Ahmed Fathi was a well-known Yemeni musician and her mother is a Yemeni who is a citizen of the UAE.
